pr_title: Hide irrelevant test jobs from deployment API payload

timeline.message: Hide irrelevant test jobs from deployment API payload

timeline.bodyText: Only these test jobs will be triggered automatically. Undeclared jobs may still be triggered by users, though, but that likely won't happen if they aren't shown here :)
timeline.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: When will an implicit job be present here?
replies.author: smorgrav

replies.bodyText: When there aren't any explicit ones.
replies.author: jonmv
